Module hanyaeger.api
Package com.github.hanyaeger.api.engine

Interface UpdateDelegator

All Superinterfaces:
Updatable
All Known Implementing Classes:
DynamicCircleEntity, DynamicEllipseEntity, DynamicRectangleEntity, DynamicScene, DynamicSpriteEntity, DynamicTextEntity, SplashScene
public interface UpdateDelegator
extends Updatable
An Updatable that delegates the update to an Updater.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    Updater getUpdater()
    Get the Updater to which the update should be delegated.
    default void update​(long timestamp)
    The update() method is called each frame.

  • Method Details

    • getUpdater

      Updater getUpdater()
      Get the Updater to which the update should be delegated.
      Returns:
      an instance of Updater

    • update

      default void update​(long timestamp)
      Description copied from interface: Updatable
      The update() method is called each frame.

      Use this method to init frame-based behaviour to the game-object.

      Specified by:
      update in interface Updatable
      Parameters:
      timestamp - The timestamp of this update.
